import { Component, OnInit, inject } from '@angular/core'; import { WeatherService } from './services/weather.service'; // import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { environment } from 'src/environment/enviromment'; import { WeatherData, Product } from './models/data.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit{ // export class AppComponent { // http = inject(HttpClient); // apiData : WeatherData[] = []; // productsAppCom : Product[]= []; // ngOnInit(): void { // this.http.get(environment.productApiURL) // .subscribe((data) =>{ // this.productsAppCom = data; // }) // } // ng add @nguniversal/express-engine constructor(private weatherService: WeatherService){ } ngOnInit(): void { // this.http.get(environment.weatherApiBaseUrl) this.weatherService.getWeatherData('Colombia') .subscribe((data) => { // this.apiData = data; next: (response) => { console.log(response); } }) } }
